alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 04 at 1:20PM PDT until August 04 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTH CENTRAL INYO COUNTY... At 120 PM PDT, Doppler radar continued to indicate thunderstorms producing heavy rain east of Keeler. Flash flooding remains possible along highway 190 between Olancha and Panamint Springs as well as along highway 136. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Keeler and Darwin. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
